post:
We’re going to be one year old in a month and we’re excited to launch our new plans for 2020, one of which is shared hosting!

Crypto Bonus: Pay with any cryptocurrency (Bitcoin, Litecoin, XRP, etc.) and get your plan’s resources doubled FOR FREE. Simply submit a ticket after ordering and we’ll double your plan’s resources at no additional cost.

Basic

  • 2 GB Storage (4 GB with the promo)
  • Unmetered Bandwidth
  • 1 Domain Name (2 with the promo)
  • 1 Email Address (2 with the promo)
  • 1 MySQL Database (2 with the promo)

Standard

  • 5 GB Storage (10 GB with the promo)
  • Unmetered Bandwidth
  • 5 Domain Names (10 with the promo)
  • Unlimited Email Addresses
  • Unlimited MySQL Databases

Professional

  • 10 GB Storage (20 GB with the promo)
  • Unmetered Bandwidth
  • 25 Domain Names (50 with the promo)
  • Unlimited Email Addresses
  • Unlimited MySQL Databases

Click here to order

All accounts are instantly provisioned after payment (and after passing automated fraud checks).

We have Softaculous Premium, DirectAdmin and basic DDoS protection. SSH access is available upon request.
